svg.title: Experiment 5 localization time at 100k facts
svg.desc: Naive sliding window localization takes about 0.020 seconds over 24 runs while VSABrains takes about 0.0011 seconds, for roughly an 18x speedup.

text.font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif
system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

svg.text: Window size = 6. Indexed localization vs full sliding-window scan.
